New Records: Pakistan secured their first T20 World Cup win against India since 1992
Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi took crucial wickets including Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma
Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan's partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam expressed pride in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Dubai International Cricket Stadium
It was Pakistan's first win over India in a World Cup since 1992
